attributes.action: Why should the people of the UK pay to-wards Council and MP's Gold plated pensions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should We pay to wards the Council public workers and MP's Pensions.
When most of our council Tax goes to wards there pensions funds, as this UK government is not giving the people of the UK a good pension for the many of the population of the UK.
